Returns: true if this callback handled the event, false if the standard MenuItem invocation should continue.
Parameters: MenuItem: The item that was clicked
onActionItemClicked(android.view.ActionM.Description: Called to report a user click on an action button.
onActionItemClicked(android.view.ActionM.FullName: public abstract boolean onActionItemClicked (ActionMode mode, MenuItem item)

Parameters: ActionMode: The current ActionMode being destroyed
onDestroyActionMode(android.view.ActionM.Description: Called when an action mode is about to be exited and destroyed.

Returns: true if the action mode should be created, false if entering this mode should be aborted.
Parameters: Menu: Menu used to populate action buttons
onCreateActionMode(android.view.ActionMo.Description: Called when action mode is first created. The menu supplied will be used to generate action buttons for the action mode.
onCreateActionMode(android.view.ActionMo.FullName: public abstract boolean onCreateActionMode (ActionMode mode, Menu menu)

Returns: true if the menu or action mode was updated, false otherwise.
Parameters: Menu: Menu used to populate action buttons
onPrepareActionMode(android.view.ActionM.Description: Called to refresh an action mode's action menu whenever it is invalidated.
onPrepareActionMode(android.view.ActionM.FullName: public abstract boolean onPrepareActionMode (ActionMode mode, Menu menu)

ClassDesc: Callback interface for action modes. Supplied to @B_android#view#View#startActionMode_E@, a Callback configures and handles events raised by a user's interaction with an action mode. An action mode's lifecycle is as follows: @B_android#view#ActionMode#Callback#onCreateActionMode_E@ once on initial creation @B_android#view#ActionMode#Callback#onPrepareActionMode_E@ after creation and any time the @B_android#view#ActionMode_E@ is invalidated @B_android#view#ActionMode#Callback#onActionItemClicked_E@ any time a contextual action button is clicked @B_android#view#ActionMode#Callback#onDestroyActionMode_E@ when the action mode is closed
